Seashell searching
Main Skill: Foraging
Max Efficiency: 250%

You search carefully along the coast for any valuable seashells or pearls.

The Seashell searching activity is a Foraging activity.

Locations

This activity can be done at the following locations:

  • Beach of Woes in Jarvonia
  • Farsand Coast in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise
  • Granfiddich Shores in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise

Requirement

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Foraging lvl. 25.

Visibility

This activity is always visible.

Secondary Drops

Each of the secondary drops is rolled independently of the others.

Item Name Item Type Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.
Foraging chest Container 1 0.400% ~1 in 250 26,250 steps 10,500 steps
Sunken chest Container 1 0.400% ~1 in 250 26,250 steps 10,500 steps

Guides

No guides exists yet. You can help make one.

Gear Sets

No gear sets exist yet. You can help make one.

Trivia

  • This is often used as a lower level money making method due to the value of the items and chests obtained from this activity along with its close proximity to a bank.
  • This was the first activity to be able to drop Sunken chest.
